string-array.name: holiday_mapping_arr
string-array.item: {"day":"Sunday","date":\""January 14\"","holiday":\""Pongal\"","comment":\""Also known as Makar Sankranti, Lohri, Bihu, Hadaga, Poki\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}

{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""January 23\"","holiday":\""Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose Jayanti\"","comment":\""Assam, Odisha, Tripura, West Bengal. Birthday of a prominent leader in the Indian freedom movement\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""January 26\"","holiday":\""Republic Day\"","comment":\""Commemorates the establishment of the Constitution of India\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""January 31\"","holiday":\""Guru Ravidas Birthday\"","comment":\""Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab only. Full moon of Magh\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""February 13\"","holiday":\""Maha Shivratri\"","comment":\""Celebrated on the 13th night/14th day in the Krishna Paksha\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 18\"","holiday":\""Sajibu Nongmapanba\"","comment":\""Manipur. 1st day of the Month of Sajibu\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""March 21\"","holiday":\""Hazrat Ali's Birthday\"","comment":\""Uttar Pradesh only. Son in law of Prophet Muhammad\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""March 23\"","holiday":\""Shaheedi Diwas of Bhagat Singh, Rajguru & Sukhdev\"","comment":\""Haryana only\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 25\"","holiday":\""Ram Navami\"","comment":\""Celebrates the birth of Lord Rama to King Dasharatha of Ayodhya\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Monday","date":\""March 26\"","holiday":\""Sri Rama Navami\"","comment":\""Celebrates the birth of Lord Rama to King Dasharatha of Ayodhya\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Thursday","date":\""March 29\"","holiday":\""Mahavir Jayanti\"","comment":\""The most important religious holiday in Jainism\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}

{"day":"Sunday","date":\""April 15\"","holiday":\""Himachal Day\"","comment":\""Himachal Pradesh only. The province of Himachal Pradesh was created on 15 April 1948\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""April 18\"","holiday":\""Basava Jayanthi\"","comment":\""Karnataka only. The most important festival of the Lingayats. 3rd Vaiskha\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}

{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""May 01\"","holiday":\""Maharashtra Day\"","comment":\""Maharashtra only. Commemorates the formation of the state of Maharashtra on 1 May 1960\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Monday","date":\""June 11\"","holiday":\""Shab-I-Qadar\"","comment":\""Jammu and Kashmir. Celebrated on the 27th day of Ramadan\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Thursday","date":\""June 28\"","holiday":\""Sant Guru Kabir Jayanti\"","comment":\""Gazetted holiday in Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab.\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""July 31\"","holiday":\""Martyrdom Day of Shaheed Udham Singh\"","comment":\""Haryana, Punjab only\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""August 26\"","holiday":\""Raksha Bandhan\"","comment":\""Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh only. Shravana Purnima\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Saturday","date":\""September 01\"","holiday":\""Parkash Utsav Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji\"","comment":\""Punjab only\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""September 02\"","holiday":\""Sreekrishna Jayanthi\"","comment":\""Kerala, Odisha. Celebrates the birth of Lord Shri Krishna\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""September 02\"","holiday":\""Janmashtami\"","comment":\""Tamil Nadu. Celebrates the birth of Lord Shri Krishna\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""September 21\"","holiday":\""Sree Narayana Guru Samadhi\"","comment":\""Kerala only. Marks the death of a key social reformer\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""October 24\"","holiday":\""Maharishi Valmiki Birthday\"","comment":\""Delhi, Haryana, Karnataka, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""November 06\"","holiday":\""Kali Puja\"","comment":\""Assam, Odisha, West Bengal. Festival dedicated to the Hindu goddess Kali\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""November 09\"","holiday":\""Ningol Chakkouba\"","comment":\""Manipur. 2nd day of the lunar month of Hiyanggei\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}

{"day":"Friday","date":\""November 23\"","holiday":\""Guru Nanak Birthday\"","comment":\""The Birthday of the founder of Sikhism, falls on full moon day of the month Kartik\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""November 23\"","holiday":\""Friday after Eid e-Milad-un Nabi\"","comment":\""Jammu and Kashmir only\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""December 16\"","holiday":\""Martyrdom Day of Sri Guru Teg Bahadur Ji\"","comment":\""Punjab only\"","lholiday":\""\"","lcomment":\""\""}

string-array.name: l_festival_arr
string-array.item: {"key":"9","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Singha rashiku rahu o kumbha ku ketu chalana\"","festivalL":\""ସିଂହ ରାଶିକୁ ରାହୁ ଓ କୁମ୍ବକୁ କେତୁ ଚଳନ \""}
{"key":"23","highlight":"1","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Nityananda prabhu nka janma utsaba\"","festivalL":\""ନିତ୍ୟାନନ୍ଦ ପ୍ରଭୁଙ୍କ ଜନ୍ମ ଉତ୍ସବ \""}
{"key":"48","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Hindu naba barsa aramva, srustyaramva dibasa\"","festivalL":\""ହିନ୍ଦୁ ନବବର୍ଷ ଆରମ୍ଭ ,ସୃଷ୍ଟି ଆରମ୍ଭ ଦିବସ\""}
{"key":"99","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Hera panchami(nandi ghosa ratha bhanga)\"","festivalL":\""ହେରା ପଞ୍ଚମୀ (ନନ୍ଦିଘୋଷରଥ ଭଙ୍ଗ )\""}
{"key":"147","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Mrunai belabarana pitha saptami puja\"","festivalL":\""ମୃଣ୍ମୟୀ ବିଲ୍ୱବରଣ ,ପୀଠ ସପ୍ତମୀ ପୂଜା\""}
{"key":"148","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"1","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Mrunai o koulika saptami puja,pitha astami puja\"","festivalL":\""ମୃଣ୍ମୟୀ ଓ କୌଳିକ ସପ୍ତମୀ ପୂଜା,ପୀଠ ଅଷ୍ଟମୀ ପୂଜା \""}
{"key":"149","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"1","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Mrunai o kou mahastami,sandhi puja,pitha mahanabami\"","festivalL":\""ମୃଣ୍ମୟୀ ଓ କୌ :ମହାଷ୍ଟମୀ ,ସନ୍ଧି ପୂଜା ,ପୀଠ ମହାନବମୀ\""}
{"key":"150","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"1","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Mrunai o kou mahanabami,pitha bishrama puja\"","festivalL":\""ମୃଣ୍ମୟୀ ଓ କୌ :ମହାନବମୀ ,ପୀଠ ବିଶ୍ରାମ ପୂଜା \""}
{"key":"177","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Kamalalochana garuda nka shradha\"","festivalL":\""କମଳ ଲୋଚନ ଗରୁଡ ଙ୍କ ଶ୍ରାଦ୍ଧ\""}
{"key":"216","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Shree Anukula chandra janma\"","festivalL":\""ଶ୍ରୀ ଅନୁକୂଳ ଚନ୍ଦ୍ର ଜନ୍ମ \""}
{"key":"225","highlight":"1","is_holiday":"1","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Shree Chaitanya janma utsaba\"","festivalL":\""ଶ୍ରୀ ଚୈତନ ଜନ୍ମ ଉତ୍ସବ\""}
